mapper.select: select count(distinct asset.id) from asset left join asset_group_relation agr on asset.id=agr.asset_id and agr.status=1 left join asset_ip_relation air on asset.id=air.asset_id and air.status=1 left join asset_mac_relation amr on asset.id=amr.asset_id and amr.status=1

select source entrySource,result entryResult,change_status changeStatus,gmt_create gmtCreate,create_user createUser from asset_entry_record where asset_id=#{primaryKey} and status=1 order by gmt_create desc,id desc
